title: Strikes Are In The Air, Cop Created Candy Conspiracy 10.1.21
itunes:title: Strikes Are In The Air, Cop Created Candy Conspiracy 10.1.21
description:
In episode 1000, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Seán Devlin to discuss workers striking, school boards begging Biden to protect them, Free Edibles: The Scourge of Halloween, According to Cops, The Insane Case That Made Dog the Bounty Hunter Famous and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Instacart workers striking… 
  2. School Boards are begging Biden to protect them
  3. Free Edibles: The Scourge of Halloween, According to Cops
  4. The Insane Case That Made Dog the Bounty Hunter Famous
  5. Comedy album: “Airports, Animals.” available via arts & crafts records
  6. LISTEN: Mansur Brown - Mashita 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
